attributes.action: Change UK law to stop criminals using articles of ECHR to avoid deportation.
attributes.additional_details: The government need to answer to the electorate why the UK justice system is being abused by convicted foreign criminals, why criminality is being rewarded with continued protection when victim rights are undermined and why the UK tax payer is continuing to fund criminals appealing the laws that allow us all to live in a civilised society.
attributes.background: Discuss why criminals have more human rights under ECHR than law abiding UK citizens and victims of crime.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the UK to leave the ECHR: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614
